lead_paragraph: British cyclist Gabriel Evans has been handed a three-and-a-half year suspension for using banned blood booster erythropoietin (EPO), UK Anti-Doping said on Thursday.

headline.print_headline: British Cyclist Evans Banned for EPO Doping
headline.main: British Cyclist Evans Banned for EPO Doping
